local_intent: Transport the grasped grapes by moving to the plate center and confirm arrival.
assumptions: Grapes are already in the gripper
Plate center pose is known and reachable
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer step: MoveTo(plate_center,1500) with a pre-check if already at target and a post-condition verifying arrival, consistent with the global sequence after lifting and before lowering to the plate.
